title: Tour of Britain Women Salvaged from Shutdown, Returns as Four-Stage Race for 2024
content:
Women's WorldTour stage-race reboots as four-day event starting from Wales on June 6, with plans to expand to six days in future.

Read the full article at Tour of Britain Women Salvaged from Shutdown, Returns as Four-Stage Race for 2024 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
